entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `lastActivityAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`chatId`))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `username` TEXT NOT NULL, `profilePictureUrl` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`userId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`messageId` TEXT NOT NULL, `chatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `senderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, `deliveryStatus` TEXT NOT NULL, `deliveryStatusTimestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`messageId`), FOREIGN KEY(`chatId`) REFERENCES `ChatEntity`(`chatId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_ChatMessageEntity_chatId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatMessageEntity_chatId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId`)

indices.name: index_ChatMessageEntity_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatMessageEntity_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`chatId`, `userId`), FOREIGN KEY(`chatId`) REFERENCES `ChatEntity`(`chatId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`userId`) REFERENCES `ChatParticipantEntity`(`userId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_chatId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_chatId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId`)

indices.name: index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_userId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_userId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`userId`)

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT m1.*, p.username AS senderUsername
        FROM chatmessageentity m1
        JOIN (
            SELECT chatId, MAX(timestamp) AS max_timestamp
            FROM chatmessageentity
            GROUP BY chatId
        ) m2 ON m1.chatId = m2.chatId AND m1.timestamp = m2.max_timestamp
        LEFT JOIN chatparticipantentity p ON m1.senderId = p.userId
